p: It is known to all that since the twenty-first century, there have been three human pathogenic coronavirus outbreaks, which have caused global transmission, bringing huge challenges to global public health and economic development [ 1]. They are the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) in 2003 [ 2], the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) in 2012 [ 3], and the new coronavirus (Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome coronavirus2, SARS-CoV-2) in 2019 [ 4]. At present, there is no specific treatment plan.
